title: Oracle Corporation
content: Oracle is the third organization that I'm working with in my career. Here, I am working on a powerful tool for Global Project Management in Construction & Engineering domain. I am also part of other web based applications in the same department. All these web apps are using the latest Javacript technologies, including React, Node.js & Express, Mongoose, ES6 with babel & webpack and ES5 with grunt & Require.JS. I am the lead front-end developer for this product, and my responsibilities includes collection of requirements from analysts, creating designs, code, create unit tests and fixing bugs. I am an active communicator with all the stakeholders of this product for technical or non-technical matters.

title: LTI - L&T
content: I worked in Larsen & Toubro Infotech Limited for a short duration. My client was a leading US based media client where I worked on a web based data analysis tool that evaluates financial parameters based on the data inputed. We used MEAN stack with Angular 1, Mongodb, Express and Node for the development of this project. I was a senior developer, and my duties involved designing, coding and unit testing.

title: Infosys
content: Infosys is where I started my professional life. This is where I learned the basics of programming. The training I was given during the initial days paved the foundation for my career. In Infosys, I was part of a project management web application which was developed in ES5 with requirejs in front-end and Node js in the backend. This application was used by the client who is a leading banker in the United States.
